title: An Act providing increased protections from harassment and discrimination on the basis of height

abstracts.abstract: By Representatives Kushmerek of Fitchburg and Puppolo of Springfield, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 1820) of Michael P. Kushmerek and Angelo J. Puppolo, Jr., relative to height discrimination.  The Judiciary.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on The Judiciary
